amendment.description: See Boehlert substitute amendment (A002) for description.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to the Boehlert amendment in the nature of a substitute to authorize a General Accounting Office study of the costs and nature of Endangered Species Act mitigation associated with routine manintenance to levees.

action.text: Amendment (A004) offered by Mr. Gilchrest to the Boehlert amendment (A002).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gilchrest amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.
